name: Air Force 1 Mid x Off-White ™️ White
shortDescription: Virgil Abloh's legacy continues with the Air Force 1 Mid. Celebrating 40 years of AF-1, he re-imagined the legendary silhouette through the futurist lens.
fullDescription: Lightweight, airy mesh with wood grain pattern brings an utilitarian edge, while the spiked outsole connects directly to the ISPA philosophy of Improvise. Scavenge. Protect. Adapt. And as always, Virgil left room for others to be creative—the design pairs traditional laces with a secondary set that loops through Flywire cables. The result: a modernised and experimental reflection on history's most revered shoe.

name: Air Jordan 1 Low Travis Scott x Fragment
shortDescription: It's the rare sneaker that satisfies the rule of three—sometimes, having three minds is greater than one. In the case of Jordan Brand, Travis Scott and Hiroshi Fujiwara's Fragment Design, it was a case of three masterminds coming together to collaborate on not just any Air Jordan, but the beloved Air Jordan 1—a model both the Houston rapper and the Japanese designer have tapped for past Jordan Brand link-ups.
fullDescription: Their Air Jordan 1 Low colourway comes in familiar colour blocking schemes, but with special touches only Scott and Fujiwara could've conjured up. On top of an aged midsole with matching Sail laces, fresh Military Blue accents the heel, collar and insole, providing a new flavour for a classic make-up. And no need for double-takes at the Sail Swoosh—it's indeed backwards—now a signature Scott touch for his Air Jordan 1 designs.But if anyone on the street rubbernecks while you're rocking this collab, they'll know who's responsible: Cactus Jack and Fragment Design logos are embossed on the left and right heels, respectively, leaving their modern marks on this time-tested silhouette.

name: FEAR OF GOD ESSENTIALS Logo-Flocked Cotton-Blend Jersey Hoodie
shortDescription: Fear of God Essentials' hoodie has been updated this season with raglan sleeves and the flocked emblem shifting over to the side. It's cut from the same soft cotton-blend jersey and has a roomy pouch pocket.
fullDescription: Operating outside of the seasonal fashion calendar, Fear of God ESSENTIALS creates a year-round selection of elevated wardrobe staples – including this iron grey hoodie. It’s cut from premium heavyweight fleece, to a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and a non-ribbed hem. Vintage athletic sweats inspire the velvety flocked logo at the chest and its rounded off with a rubberised tonal label on the hood.

name: FEAR OF GOD ESSENTIALS Logo-Print Cotton-Jersey T-Shirt
shortDescription: Fear of God Essentials is aptly named - the label has put years of research into creating the ultimate wardrobe staples. This T-shirt is cut from soft cotton-jersey and features the brand's moniker stamped onto the chest.
fullDescription: Add a touch of Jerry Lorenzo’s luxury to your everyday wardrobe with this neutral tee from Fear of God ESSENTIALS. It’s made from pure cotton and cut to a slim fit, then stamped with signature branding on the chest.

name: JACQUES MARIE MAGE Ascari Square-Frame Acetate Sunglasses
shortDescription: Jacques Marie Mage's sunglasses are a retro style inspired by Italian racer and two-time Formula One World Champion during the '50s, Alberto Ascari. Handcrafted in Japan from lightweight acetate, they have a bold square shape, wide arms and custom double-laminated temples.

name: PANERAI Submersible Quaranta Quattro Automatic 44mm Brushed Stainless Steel and Rubber Watch,
shortDescription: Panerai's 'Submersible Quarant Quattro' watch is built to support even the most challenging dives. Resistant up to 30 bar, this brushed stainless steel version has been handcrafted in Switzerland and powered by an automatic P.900 calibre movement with an impressive three-day power reserve.
fullDescription: Panerai's 'Submersible Quaranta Quattro' watch is built to support even the most challenging dives. Resistant up to 30 bar, this brushed stainless steel version has been handcrafted in Switzerland and powered by an automatic P.900 calibre movement with an impressive three-day power reserve. The unidirectional rotating bezel allows for precise timekeeping - ideal for tracking how much oxygen is remaining - while SuperLumiNova™ hands and markers are visible even under water. A signature crown-protector bridge and durable caoutchouc rubber strap complete the design. We offer a two-year warranty for all working parts and manufacturing faults for luxury watches. For more information, contact one of our experts by emailing watches@pyrogarm.com
